titleStmt.title: Scotland mourning: or, A short discovery of the sad consequences which accompanies the delay of the setling judicatories in that nation. By Robert Pittilloh advocate.
titleStmt.author: Pittilloh, Robert, 1621?-1698.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Robert Pittillok, i.e. Pittilloh.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
